item.title: Re: xf86-video-intel is required for xrandr to work
item.description:
It says on the arch wiki https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Intel_graphics that the package is generally not recommended, I also heard that the package is deprecated or isn't updated as much but i might have misunderstood or smth changed.
So does this...
item.dc:creator: Will7

item.title: Re: Installing drivers for Canon i-SENSYS MF113w ppd files
item.description:
This will be reminder to read manuals first.
From CUPS manual page.
Quote
lpadmin -p Canon-i-SENSIS-MF113w -E -v ipp://192.168.1.***/ipp/print -m everywhere

CUPS uses universal drivers everywhere for most network printers from 2009.
item.dc:creator: u0

item.title: [SOLVED] Installing drivers for Canon i-SENSYS MF113w ppd files
item.description:
I want to install Canon i-SENSYS MF113w printer for network printing.
cups identify it as Canon_MF110_910_Series

I installed every driver source I could:
Quote
foomatic-db-engine
foomatic-db
foomatic-db-ppds
foomatic-db-nonfree
foomatic-db-nonfre...
